Building Services

Delivering integrated specialist engineering and design services for the built environment.

AESG is recognised as global leaders in sustainable buildings, having delivered some of the world’s most iconic developments. We take pride in solving our client’s greatest challenges, through collaboration, innovation and advanced technical solutions.

Through our global experience, our multidisciplinary services build on an integrated approach to building engineering and design, ensuring coordination between all relevant disciplines throughout the development’s lifecycle to optimise building performance.

  • Sustainable buildings
  • Healthy buildings
  • Specialty services
